nodes.text: Zarado was an individual of a species that possessed horns who was a student at a school on the desert planet Merokia during the time of the New Republic, at the same time as the Force-sensitive Karr Nuq Sin. At the age of thirteen years old, Zarado's horns began to grow longer.
Zarado was first mentioned in the 2019 novel Force Collector, written by Kevin Shinick.
